ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Exception Detected! A client-side exception has occurred, see here for more info: https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/client-side-exception-occurred
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior https://nextjs.org/docs/messages/client-side-exception-occurred ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/83757237/d7c4fc89-9ef5-456c-97bf-46bbedb6cd05) ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/83757237/a55ac05e-7e33-4596-8b17-91240f011cda) ### Steps to reproduce Do something and this is happened sometimes ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Self-hosted

controllers for new schema * fix: build * chore: asana and linear controller * feat: updated job controller for new schema changes * chore: added permissions * integrations api migrations changes
